sentences.en: It was a hot, humid summer day.
sentences.cn: 这是个炎热潮湿的夏日。

sentences.en: It's hot out — very hot, very humid.
sentences.cn: 外面很热——非常炎热而且非常潮湿。

sentences.en: It's too humid today; it's hard to breathe!
sentences.cn: 今天真闷热, 热得透不过气来!

sentences.en: Overweight and sweating in the humid weather, she stamped from room to room.
sentences.cn: 她很胖，在潮湿的天气里浑身大汗，烦躁地在各个房间之间噔噔地走来走去。

sentences.en: Ridges occur in humid regions along belts of resistant rocks.
sentences.cn: 在潮湿地区,山脊沿着耐蚀的石带发育.

sentences.en: Sometimes two crops a year are taken in the humid tropics.
sentences.cn: 在湿润的热带地区有时一年种两季作物.

sentences.en: The climate also seemed to her strange and humid.
sentences.cn: 气候也是那样的怪异,潮湿.

sentences.en: The moisture in the air makes it humid today.
sentences.cn: 今天空气中水气大,天气很潮湿.

sentences.en: The South has hot, humid summers, short winters and long growing season.
sentences.cn: 南部地区夏季湿热, 冬季短,生长季节长.

sentences.en: These ferns will grow best in a humid atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 这些蕨类植物在湿热的环境中长得最旺。

sentences.en: These systems appear ecologically well adapted to the humid tropics.
sentences.cn: 这些系统对于潮湿热带地区表现良好的生态适应.

sentences.en: This humid heat makes you feel rather sluggish.
sentences.cn: 这种湿热的天气使人感到懒洋洋的.

sentences.en: Tokyo is extremely humid in mid-summer.
Visitors can expect hot and humid condi-tions.
sentences.cn: 游客会遇到炎热潮湿的天气状况。

sentences.en: Visitors can expect hot and humid conditions.
sentences.cn: 游客会遇到炎热潮湿的天气状况。

trans.tran_cn: 潮湿的，湿气重的，湿润的，温湿
trans.tran_en: if the weather is humid, you feel uncomfortable because the air is very wet and usually hot
